SummaryEnglish: The story begins when Erika, from the Magic World, gives Himeko a magical ribbon and pendant that allows her to assume the identity of anyone in the Human World just by looking in the mirror and saying the magic words: parallel, parallel turn me into (name)! The ribbon is a part of Erikas' "Observation of the Human World" training, which lasts for one year. The only drawback is that Hime chan must keep the ribbon and all of its powers a secret from everyone. Hime chan eventually gains other magical items and gets into all kinds of predicaments trying to get herself out of trouble and hide her secret from everyone.
SummaryJapanese:
風立第一中学校に通う中学1年生・野々原姫子は、憧れの支倉先輩に似合うような淑やかな女子になりたいと願っていた。
そんな時、姫子とそっくりな顔をした魔法の国の王女・エリカが現れる。話を聞くと、王家を継ぐための修行として、1年間観察して日記をつけさせてもらう代わりに、他人に変身できる魔法のリボンを貸してくれると言うのだった。
お転婆な姫子がジッしていられるハズがなく…小林大地を巻き込んで…。

1.TitleJapanese: リボンコレクションスペシャル

1.SummaryEnglish: A very cute girl, with long blonde hair and a red ribbon, Erika, a Princess from the Land of Magic gives a tomboy Hime-chan a magical ribbon which could transform her into any other living person on Earth. In the Land of Magic, everybody's duty is to invent magical items. Erika has invented the ribbon she gave to Hime-chan for one year, in return for the permission to let her observe. But Hime-chan is somewhat scared to do so, until she hears a voice from her stuffed animal Pokota that can now talk.
1.TitleJapanese: 魔法使いになっちゃった
1.SummaryJapanese: 魔法の国の王女エリカは、自分以外に変身できる「魔法のリボン」を、人間界に住むおてんばな野々原姫子に試してもらうことにした。

2.SummaryEnglish: Since she arrives at the school gate late, Hime-chan spots Gori-sensei on guard. She uses a car mirror to turn herself into the principal. After that she stands in front of a mirror to turn back to her own self, but it doesn't work at all. She later turns herself into her sister Aiko. Hasekura confesses to her thinking it's real Aiko.
2.SummaryJapanese: 演劇部の支倉先輩に好意を寄せる姫子。合格祈願のお守りを、愛子お姉ちゃんに変身して渡そうとするのだが、先輩が好きだったのは…

3.TitleEnglish: Transformation into the Senpai I Admire
3.SummaryEnglish: Hime-chan realizes that Hasekura must be thinking that he confessed his love to her sister Aiko for real the day before! Also it must have been a shock to him to see Aiko running away. Daichi comes by and does what Hime-chan asked him to do, try to pick up Aiko, so Himeko (transformed into Hasekura) could heroically save her, and make a new confession to the real Aiko on senpai's behalf.
3.TitleJapanese: あこがれの先輩に変身
3.SummaryJapanese: 支倉先輩は、お姉ちゃんに変身した姫子に告白。そのことを知らない愛子。二人に責任を感じた姫子はある計画を思いつくのだった。

4.SummaryEnglish: At school, everybody is setting up the stage. While installing lights, a student falls off a ladder onto Hasekura. He sprained his ankle and won't be able to play his role. so the play will be canceled. Hime-chan turns herself into the principal so she could postpone the performance of the theater club until the following week
4.SummaryJapanese: 支倉先輩に変身して愛子お姉ちゃんに告白した姫子。一方、思わぬケガで主役ができなくなった支倉先輩のため、姫子は校長に変身。

5.SummaryEnglish: Himeko and Daichi were running away from the teacher. They climbed over a fence, but Himeko's ribbon got torn apart. When Hime-chan landed on the ground, she tried to talk to Pokota, her little stuffed lion. But the magic didn't work any more. A strange girl came asking for Hime-chan. Hibino Hikaru, number 1 member of the Daichi fan club who thinks she's the prettiest girl in the school, and that she was going to marry Daichi in the future.
5.TitleJapanese: ぶっとび少女ひかる登場
5.SummaryJapanese: 魔法のリボンを破いてしまい、ポコ太と話せなくなって落ち込む姫子。「小林大地ファンクラブ会長」を名乗る日比野ひかるが登場。

6.SummaryEnglish: After meeting Hikaru, Hime-chan was in the form of Daichi. But since the magic ribbon hadn't fully recovered yet, she could not return to her normal self. Hime-chan found Daichi's hideout. When she was looking for a way inside, Hime-chan ran into the real Daichi.
6.SummaryJapanese: ひかるの誤解を解くために大地に変身した姫子は、元に戻れなくなった。空腹のまま町をさまよう姫子は本物の大地に出会ってしまう。

7.SummaryEnglish: Daichi is suspicious of Himeko. Himeko starts to stumble off, but then her vision goes blurry, and she passes out, collapsing to the floor of the gym. She turns out to have a big fever, and is sent home. Daichi vists her at home, they argue and she pretends not to know what he's talking about. Himeko and Pokota see a little boy leaving Daichi's apartment. Himeko wants to pump him for information about Daichi, so she turns into her little sister Yumeko to achieve this.
7.SummaryJapanese: 姫子は風邪で寝込んでしまった。お見舞いにやってきた大地は変身に気づいてる！？秘密を守るため、姫子とポコ太は新作戦を展開。

8.SummaryEnglish: Hime-chan was sneaking around the park where Daichi's younger brother Shintaro was playing. Then Shintaro started crying as some guy grabbed him and pulled him into a car. Daichi and Hime-chan follow the kidnapper to his hideout to save Shintaro.
8.SummaryJapanese: 大地の弟、森太郎が誘拐された。犯人を追いつめたが、人質の身が危うくて救出できない。姫子は大地の前で森太郎に変身し…。

9.SummaryEnglish: Since Himeko revealed the secret of ribbon's powers to Daichi, Erika must erase her memory and take the magical item. Will she be able to sway her father, the King, to forgive her and grant her more time? Meanwhile, Daichi brings Hime-chan back to his hideout as she explains everything that happened until now more properly.
9.TitleJapanese: ピンチ!記憶が消される
9.SummaryJapanese: 大地の前で魔法を見せた姫子。魔法の王国の掟に従えば、記憶が消されてしまう！全てを打ち明けられた大地は秘密厳守を約束した。

10.TitleEnglish: I Like You More Than a Meat Bun
10.SummaryEnglish: The teacher introduced a new transfer student, Arisaka Sei. The rumor spread around that he's together with Himeko. Hikaru congratulated Hime-chan. Erika said that she thought that she had seen Sei somewhere before.
10.TitleJapanese: 肉まんよりも君が好き!
10.SummaryJapanese: 姫子のクラスに美少年、有坂が転校してきて、女の子の人気を集めまくった。そんな彼が肉まんをパクつく姫子に近づき、好意を告白！

11.SummaryEnglish: Sei took control over Pokota and sent him to attack Daichi. Himeko doesn't believe that he would do that because he's always nice to her. Daichi thinks that Sei might be from the Land of Magic.
11.SummaryJapanese: 有坂が転校してきて以来、おかしなことが連発。大地は彼を疑うが、有坂からの告白に舞い上がる姫子は大地とケンカになってしまう。

12.SummaryEnglish: Hime-chan was following Sei home from the amusement park as Yumeko. Hime-chan went into the yard of Sei's house. She tried to peek in through the window. But Sei came and caught her.Sei revealed that his real name was Sei Array, and Erika's fiancee.
12.TitleJapanese: 好きだっていったのに
12.SummaryJapanese: 有坂への疑惑を持ち始めた姫子は、夢子に変身して尾行する。だが変身は簡単に見破られてしまう。まさか有坂も魔法の国の住人？

13.SummaryEnglish: It's been 2 weeks since Arisaka Sei Array went back to the Land of Magic. On her way back home, Hime-chan sees, on TV in a shop window, the SMAP [seven idol singers] team singing Egao no Genki on stage [that is the anime's own OP theme!], and thinks to herself it would be nice to bring them to the Christmas event. She intends to turn herself successively into each of the SMAP members and then they'll be able to hold a party!
13.SummaryJapanese: クリスマス演芸大会に出演予定の演劇部員、支倉先輩が引退して部員が激減。姫子はSMAPに変身し、舞台を盛り上げようとするが…。

14.SummaryEnglish: Hikaru and lots of other girls started chasing Kusanagi Tsuyoshi (trasnformed Hime) in the streets. Out of breath, Hime-chan/Tsuyoshi hid himself in the bushes of the nearby park, when Hikaru caught up to her and the pendant started beeping, and even worse, the photographer took a picture of both of them. Later, Hikaru thinks to herself that the Tsuyoshi she has met wasn't quite like the one she has seen on TV. Will she discover Hime's secret?
14.TitleJapanese: ぶっとびひかるの名推理
14.SummaryJapanese: SMAPの草彅君に変身した姫子は、ひかるに追い回され、写真週刊誌にツーショットを撮られてしまう。これは大スクープだ！

15.TitleEnglish: Pokota’s SOS from the Stormy Mountain
15.SummaryEnglish: Hikaru heard Pokota speak at the cabin on a school ski trip. She later decided to go skiing by herself, with Pokota in her pocket and headed for the back woods ignoring "danger" sign and fell down the cliff. Hime-chan must risk revealing that Pokota is alive by putting the ribbon on and going out to save Hikaru.
15.SummaryJapanese: 2泊3日の雪山スキー学級で、姫子たちは大はしゃぎ。しかし、連れてきたポコ太が話しているところをひかるに見られてしまう。

16.SummaryEnglish: Hime-chan needed someone to sew pokota. Daichi said that he would be gone for a couple days, and asked Hime to "fill in for him" at school if needed. Just as Hime-chan transformed, a bee went into Hikaru's face. When Hikaru looked up, she saw Daichi. Daichi ran down past Hikaru. Hikaru was surprised. Hikaru began to suspect something.
16.TitleJapanese: ひかるは何でもお見通し
16.SummaryJapanese: 大地は姫子に授業の代返を頼んで旅に出た。仕方なく大地に変身するシーンをひかるにが目撃！ひかるは姫子が妖怪なのではと疑う。

17.SummaryEnglish: Hikaru was at a hamburger store wondering why Hime-chan didn't transform. She was with some of the other girls of the Daichi fan club. One of the other girls had a science fiction book. The title was "parallel world", and when Hikaru saw it, she realized what the magic word for Hime-chan's transformation was. She decides to set a trap for her with the help of a magazine photographer.
17.TitleJapanese: エッ!変身がもどらない
17.SummaryJapanese: 姫子の秘密を暴きたいひかるは、週刊誌カメラマンと二人で姫子を罠へと追い込んだ。姫子がひかるに変身した瞬間、シャッターが…。

18.TitleEnglish: A Smile Matches You for Sure
18.SummaryEnglish: At Hime-chan's birthday party, Erika is filling in for her. She still can't transform back. Erika said that her grandfather, the strongest person in the land of magic, might be able to help Hime-chan. Later Sei told Daichi that that only way Hime-chan could return to her normal body was if she died.
18.TitleJapanese: 君には笑顔がにあってる
18.SummaryJapanese: 姫子のピンチは、エリカが時間を止めてくれたおかげで切り抜けられた。だけど、リボンが壊れて変身がとけなくなってしまう。

19.SummaryEnglish: Two days before Valentine's Day Gori (the teacher) made and announcement that no chocolate was allowed in school. Everyone was very disappointed. After school that day Manami asked Hime-chan and Icchan to go shopping for chocolates with her. She wondered if she should give it to Daichi.
19.TitleJapanese: チョコレートがいっぱい
19.SummaryJapanese: 女の子の勝負の日、バレンタインデー！たまたま大地に変身した時、チョコを山ほど受け取ってしまう姫子。自分の分のチョコの行方は？

20.SummaryEnglish: Hime-chan's father comes back home with a big smile on his face: he has been hired to make a film with Hoshino Mayuri, the famous idol singer. Hime-chan transforms into a man visibly from the studios' staff to get in so she could get an autograph from Mayuri.
20.TitleJapanese: アイドルはたいへんだあ
20.SummaryJapanese: 姫子の父が超アイドル「星野まゆり」映画の監督になった。撮影現場では、スタッフたちが星野まゆりのわがままに困りきっていた。

21.SummaryEnglish: Hime scolds Daichi for doing dangerous things, the truck has an accident, and the horse it was carrying runs away. Daichi quickly runs after it, jumps onto the horse's back, and manages to control him. The horse's master, a cute brown haired-girl, kindly scolds the horse she calls Dream-gou. Sayuri asks for Daichi's help. Sayuri who got hurt, so Daichi asks Himeko to take her place.
21.SummaryJapanese: 競走馬ドリーム号の調教師、さゆりと大地は知り合いだった。さゆりが怪我をしたため、姫子はさゆりに変身して調教に挑んだが…。

22.SummaryEnglish: Hime had plenty of free tickets for Mayuri's new movie. Daichi, dashes and steals one and says he'd like to see the movie too. Daichi runs into his grandfather who tells him there's a croquet game today. Daichi isn't happy but cannot refuse to help them. Hime-chan and Pokota are watching the movie, but Hime-chan can't calm down, so she leaves to go and get Daichi. Hime-chan transforms into Rie, who left the game because of back pain, or they wouldn't be able to continue the game.
22.SummaryJapanese: 祖父が参加するゲートボール大会を手伝う大地。姫子はおばあさんにこっそり変身して、大地や老人たちとゲートボールを楽しんだ。

23.SummaryEnglish: While cleaning Hime's room, Aiko stumbles onto her old diary she wrote while she had a crush on Hasekura. She doesn't wanna hurt her sister so she stops seeing Hasekura, and starts dating another guy. Himeko, realizing something strange is going on, sets out to fix the situation at hand.
23.TitleJapanese: はつこい に さよなら
23.SummaryJapanese: 愛子は姫子の部屋で「支倉先輩ノート」を発見してしまう。先輩の前から身を引こうとする愛子を引き止めるため、姫子は変身して…。

24.SummaryEnglish: "Good-bye my first love. Thanks for the memories," Hime-chan said as she tore up her diary and threw the shreds out the window. Then Hime-chan saw Erika on her broom. Erika told Hime-chan that she was going to have a birthday party. She had gotten the approval to allow Hime-chan to come.
24.SummaryJapanese: エリカの誕生日パーティに招待され、はじめて魔法の国を訪れた姫子とポコ太。ポコ太は猫のピンクちゃんに一目惚れしてしまう。

25.SummaryEnglish: Daichi told Hime-chan and Pokota that Shintaro began telling lies about one week ago. Shintaro said to other kids that his father was actually Fire Cop (tv show character). Hime-chan and Daichi went to the TV studio (where Hime-chan's father worked), and borrowed the Fire Cop costume. Hime-chan and Daichi then went to Daichi's father and tried to talk hime into doing it.
25.TitleJapanese: それゆけぼくのムテキパパ
25.SummaryJapanese: 分身できるという「魔法のパレット」。試してみると、姫子に見た目はそっくりなのに、とてもおとなしい分身が現れた。

26.SummaryEnglish: Some guys in sunglasses were trying to grab a girl. Hime-chan thought that the girl was getting kidnapped. So she transformed into the policeman that she had met. Hime-chan ran toward the scene and threw her Himeko kick into the guys. Gori introduced a transfer student, Hijiri Yuka. It was the cute girl that Hime-chan had saved earlier. She recognized Daichi and called him "Dai-chan". She had lived next door to Daichi.
26.TitleJapanese: キニナルの彼女は天皇制
26.SummaryJapanese: 新学期を迎えて姫子は中学2年生に。クラスには大地、ひかる、有坂がせいぞろい。大地の幼なじみという聖結花も転校してきた。

27.TitleEnglish: The Story of Daichi’s First Love?!
27.SummaryEnglish: TV crew hand come to interview Yuka. She said that Dai-chan was the most important person to her. She later applies for the same role in school play as Himeko. She later follows Diachi to his hideout staircase.
27.SummaryJapanese: 新入生歓迎会でピーターパンを演じることになった姫子。結花は大地にキスを迫るなど、好意をアピール。演劇部にも入部してきた。

28.SummaryEnglish: Class was trying to decide what to do for the freshman party. Hime-chan's idea "takoyaki house" won. Yuka starts often fainting from being overworked. Later, Pokota saw Yuka getting kidnapped on the street. Himeko and Daichi go to save her.
28.SummaryJapanese: 姫子は人気者のアイドル結花にコンプレックスを感じてしまう。そんな結花もクラスで孤立したり、ヤクザにさらわれたりと…。

29.TitleEnglish: Hearts Connected by an Old Promise
29.SummaryEnglish: Yuka needs to go abroad to play a role in a movie. Her birthday is tommorow. She's happy Daichi remembered, but gets mad when she realises he forgot a promise he made when they were kids.
29.TitleJapanese: こころ を つなぐ とおい やくそく
29.SummaryJapanese: 姫子と仲直りしたのに、再び転校することになった結花。彼女の誕生日をおぼえていた大地は、二人の間の約束も思い出せるか？

30.SummaryEnglish: In the Land of Magic, Camille is preparing some strange chemical beverage. Laughing, he swears that, thanks to it, Roberia will lose her head over him, but he drops the vial right onto Pink. Pink must be kissed within 12 hours or she will sleep forever. Now it's up to Pokota to save the one he loves.
30.TitleJapanese: ぽこた！ あい の ため に はしれ！
30.SummaryJapanese: カミルが作った魔法の薬がピンクちゃんに誤ってかかってしまい、眠りこけてしまう。目覚めさせる唯一の方法は愛のこもったキス！

31.SummaryEnglish: Aiko, Yumeko, and Hime-chan are talking to each other about what they will give Mother next Sunday. Aiko then suggests to her sisters to make a present of their own. She'll try to bake some cakes, so Hime-chan will try to have some cookies ready too. But there is just one problem, Himeko is bad at cooking. Will she be able to pull this one off without cheating?
31.SummaryJapanese: 母の日に姫子は心のこもった手作りクッキーをプレゼントしたかった。だけど、クッキーを焼くには不器用すぎるという現実が…。

32.TitleEnglish: Hikaru! The Shocking Kiss with Daichi
32.SummaryEnglish: Hikaru was at home bored. There was nothing she wanted to watch on TV. Then Hikaru found a book on card fortune telling. She starts making up predictions, and then, one by one they come true. Then she predicts that Daichi will kiss her by the end of the week, and that Sei will kiss Hime-chan! Will these predictions come true as well?
32.TitleJapanese: ひかる！大地と衝撃キス
32.SummaryJapanese: ひかるのトランプ占いが大盛況。一週間以内に大地と彼女がキスをする？占いの行方が気になってたまらない姫子だった。

33.SummaryEnglish: Kantaro (Sei's bird) came because Camille had asked him to check up on Sei. Kantaro said that Sei's popularity had gone down in the land of magic, even with young girls. Sei made a bet with Camille to go out with 5 girls within 2 days. Because Camille looks exactly like Daichi, his actions create a lot of trouble for him.
33.TitleJapanese: お気楽カミルに大迷惑
33.SummaryJapanese: 魔法の国からカミルが人間界にやってきて、有坂と勝負をすることに。大地と顔が似ていることを利用したカミルの作戦とは？

34.SummaryEnglish: Yamashita Hatsune, Himeko's old neighbor, is coming back to be a teacher of Hime-chan's class at Kazetachi Junior High. Kids from the class bully her and she becomes discouraged about being a techer. Can Himeko help her get her confidence back?
34.SummaryJapanese: 姫子のクラスに美人の教育実習生がやってきた。男子生徒の人気急上昇と反対にひかるたち女生徒は不愉快になっていった。

35.TitleEnglish: Watch Out for Pochi the Lost Dog!
35.SummaryEnglish: Hime-chan spotted a little dog on the street. Hime-chan took the dog home. They call him Pochi and decide to keep it until they find the real owner. Meanwhile, Hikaru is very disstressed and looking for Daichi, but he doesn't have a clue why when Himeko tells him about it.
35.SummaryJapanese: 学校からの帰り道、姫子は迷子の子犬をひろってきた。ポチと名付けられた子犬は姫子になついて野々原家の一員となるが…。

36.TitleEnglish: Hasekura-senpai! Following the Dreams of His Youth
36.SummaryEnglish: Aiko is upset because Hasekura had an exchange student program and the exam was coming up on Sunday. He had a chance to go to America for a half year, and it had always been his dream to go study abroad. Hime-chan turned herself into Aiko and called Hasekura. Hime-chan said that she just wanted to wish him well, and also to do a good luck charm.
36.TitleJapanese: 支倉先輩！青春の旅立ち
36.SummaryJapanese: 最近、元気のない愛子お姉ちゃん。支倉先輩がブロンドの年上美人と英語でデートしてる？二人を目撃した姫子は本気で怒った。

37.SummaryEnglish: Himeko took some of her old toys to the hideout. Hime-chan saw Gori and a couple other men by the gate making measurements outside of the house. They were going to tear down the old house. Hime-chan quickly used the mirror in her palette to transform into Gori-sensei. Then Hime-chan made a copy of herself, and Gori saw two "ghosts".
37.SummaryJapanese: 姫子と大地の秘密の隠れ家は、捨てられない大切なものの保管場所。そんな家を取り壊そうとやって来たのは五利先生？

38.SummaryEnglish: Camille accidentally releases Masshi and Hosshi, two big eared, fluffy animals, from a jar they were trapped in. They decided to follow Hime-chan. They go to her school and use their powers to prank teachers and students.
38.SummaryJapanese: 魔法の国のお城の中、カミルたちは不思議なビンを発見。そのビンの中から逃げ出したのは、イタズラ好きな双子の妖精だった。

39.SummaryEnglish: Masshi and Hosshi (the two fairies who escaped from the land of magic) were playing around in the human world. Hime-chan was given some new magic to catch them. Camille said that he came to help find the fairies. Camille brought some special potion with him. When Gori was going to scold the students, the eraser fell on top of his head. Hime-chan knew that the fairies must be around. Then Hime-chan used her palette to capture the fairies.
39.TitleJapanese: ホットケーキは甘い罠
39.SummaryJapanese: 人間界でイタズラをしまくる妖精、マッシ―とホッシー。捕まえるために用意したのは、妖精が好きなエッセンス入りのホットケーキ。

40.SummaryEnglish: Icchan and Manami tease Hime-chan about Daichi, who retorts that she and he are just friends. Hikaru also thinks it's so great to be able to rely on boys' friendship, so Icchan and Manami get mad and tell her their girls' friendship is as good. But Hikaru doesn't believe them, as her mother told her, only a boys' friendship is strong enough and girls' friendship is an illusion since all they believe in is love.
40.TitleJapanese: ハチャメチャ友情大作戦
40.SummaryJapanese: 友情に燃える姫子たち仲良しトリオ。ひかるに「女の友情なんてもろいものよ」と言われムキになって、友情をアピールすることに。

41.SummaryEnglish: At a nearby theater, a knight uses his magical sword to defeat the evil monster and rescue the princess. Shintaro [Daichi's younger brother], calls Yumeko. He comes to her but she shyly says she doesn't know him, even though they have played together in the past. [Note: Shintaro DID play with Yumeko in episode 7 but that was Hime-chan transformed into Yumeko] The other kids tease Shintaro for having been dumped by her.
41.SummaryJapanese: 大地の弟、森太郎と姫子の妹、夢子を仲良しにしたい姫子。大地兄弟と姫子姉妹のダブルデート作戦ははたして成功するか？

42.SummaryEnglish: Hime-chan and Pokota cannot sleep because of the warmth of the night (it's summer), so they go to the window and open it, and spot a strange light moving quickly in the sky. The next day at school, Icchan is sleepy, as she didn't sleep much the previous night because she also saw the UFO. Then Daichi and Tetsu come by and invite the three girls to go camping where they'll see plenty of shooting stars far from the city lights. They beg Gori-sensei, who also saw the UFO and used to belong to a UFO club at school, to escort them.
42.SummaryJapanese: 夏の夜空に不思議な光が！UFOかもと興味を持った姫子や大地たち。謎の光を追跡し、郊外でキャンプをすることになった。

43.SummaryEnglish: Manami takes Hime-chan and Icchan to a swimsuit store. They go in and each of them quickly picks up the swimsuit they like. At Hime-chan's home, Father shows them some entrance tickets he got for the amusement park where he plans to take his family the next day. Later in her room, Hime-chan tells Pokota that she is confronted with a dilemma: she wants to go with her friends to the Waterland (superbig swimming pools). Hime-chan splits herself and sends Hime-copy with her father and Yumeko to the amusement park.
43.SummaryJapanese: 水着を買ってハワイへ行こう！お店の福引で招待券が当たった姫子や大地たちはプールへ行くことに。先約があった姫子は分身して…。

44.SummaryEnglish: Wearing track suits Daichi, Hime-chan, Icchan, and Manami run into a very strange man who is hiding himself behind dark glasses, scarf, and trench coat. But Icchan recognizes him as Gori-sensei immediately, startling everyone. Gori looks like he is trying to "avoid" Hikaru by all means. She dislikes summer holidays because everybody goes to the countryside, leaving her alone.
44.TitleJapanese: ひかるの懲りない夏休み
44.SummaryJapanese: 夏休み、姫子たちは五利先生の田舎へ泊りに行くことに。そこで、近くの別荘へきていたひかりとバッタリ会ってしまった。

45.SummaryEnglish: The phone is ringing at Hime-chan's house, so she hurries but falls down the stairs. It is Hasekura-senpai. He wants to talk to Aiko but she has gone out. After hanging up, Hime-chan remembers that Hasekura is going to leave that Sunday. Back in her room, Hime-chan looks at the sky out of the window, lost in her thoughts.
45.SummaryJapanese: 支倉先輩がアメリカ留学に発つ日が近づいた。姫子は、先輩にひそかに憧れていた頃のことを一つずつ思い出していた。

46.SummaryEnglish: It was Saturday night, just one day before Hasekura-senpai was leaving for America. Hime-chan, in her pajamas, is looking out of her window to the night sky, thinking. Pokota comes by, and tells her with a little voice that she might still be in love with Hasekura.
46.SummaryJapanese: 支倉先輩と愛子お姉ちゃんのキューピット役をつとめる姫子。出発の日、空港ではなく、自分の部屋の窓から姫子は彼を見送った。

47.SummaryEnglish: The weather is wonderful outside.. but Hime-chan is just sleeping at her desk, "on" her homework. Her mother comes in and tells her that she is leaving with her husband to hand in her manuscript, and that she will be back in the evening. Then as Hime-chan starts to sleep again, Aiko and Yumeko come in and ask her if she wants to go to the swimming pool with them. But Hime-chan just wants to stay home and sleep.
47.SummaryJapanese: 夏休みになり、大地はひとりで自転車旅行へ出かけてしまった。姫子は大地に変身して町を歩いてみた。

48.SummaryEnglish: The editor gives a message for her mother that he got from somebody in the audience. The message says, "Hurry to hit the end mark. Otherwise you'll be in the grip of death". It scares them all but the editor doesn't remember whom he got it from. Himeko notices that the strange guy has left, and wonders if he is the author of this message.
48.SummaryJapanese: 姫子の母の小説がベストセラーとなり、パーティを開いた。しかし、脅迫状が届いたり、怪しい男が現れたりと事件が起こる。

49.SummaryEnglish: Just after Hanako [Hime-chan's mother] has got the phone call saying that Yumeko has disappeared from the kindergarten, Daichi's father goes there and asks Yumeko's teacher and classmates what they have seen. The kids tell him that the guy who has been seen with Yumeko was wearing dark glasses. At home, Hime-chan says it was the same guy she had seen looking at her mother during the reception.
49.TitleJapanese: ハートタクトで大あばれ
49.SummaryJapanese: 夢子が誘拐？母が書いた小説とそっくり同じ事が起きている。姫子は魔法の新アイテム、ハートタクトを使って…。

50.TitleEnglish: A small Hime-chan and a big mistake
50.TitleJapanese: スモール姫ちゃん大失敗
50.SummaryJapanese: 演劇部の発表会。姫子は出演予定の人形を壊してしまう。ハートタクトで変身し、自分が人形の代役をつとめたのだが…。

51.TitleEnglish: The promise tied to the ribbon
51.SummaryJapanese: 魔法の国の王女、エリカに魔法のリボンを預けられてから1年…。そろそろリボンを返す日が近づいてきた。

52.SummaryJapanese: エリカが王位を継承するための審査発表会がやってきた。結果発表を聞くため姫子は魔法の国へと向かう。

53.TitleEnglish: Writing a love story isn't that easy
53.TitleJapanese: ラブストーリーはつらいヨ
53.SummaryJapanese: 文化祭で演劇部はオリジナル劇に挑戦。脚本は姫子。ラブストーリーのために男子を観察しようとする姫子は…。

54.SummaryJapanese: 姫子の親友、愛美が作った料理を食べた部員がお腹を壊してしまった。責任を感じた愛美たちは助っ人をかって出る。

55.TitleJapanese: 姫子のドタバタ恋愛講座
55.SummaryJapanese: 愛美が剣道部の高田君に恋をしてしまった。それって初恋？姫子は愛のキューピットとしてはりきるのだった。

56.SummaryJapanese: 今までいろいろな秘密を共有してきた姫子と大地。大地は自分にとって何なのだろう。姫子は色々な出来事を思い出していた。

57.TitleEnglish: A presentiment of love, just a bit but..
57.TitleJapanese: ちょっとだけ恋の予感
57.SummaryJapanese: 秘密の隠れ家は姫子と大地のふたりだけの場所。たくさんの思い出とともにかけがえのない存在になっていく大地のことが…。

58.TitleEnglish: Please take me to the future
58.TitleJapanese: 私を未来に連れてって
58.SummaryJapanese: 有坂から“未来が見える時計”を借りて3年後の世界へ行ってみた姫子。高校生になっている姫子と大地の関係は？

59.SummaryJapanese: 有坂が魔法の国へ帰ることになり、エリカも王位継承の修行を終えた。いくつかの別れが、姫子や大地に近づいていた。

60.TitleEnglish: I love you, Daichi, so much
60.SummaryJapanese: 大地が転校することになった。明るく振舞う姫子だったが、自分の気持ちを伝えようと大地のもとへ…。

61.TitleEnglish: Lots of confusion in the Land of Magic
61.SummaryJapanese: エリカの王位継承合格のパーティーが盛大に催された。姫子も大地と一緒に招待された。そこに日比野ひかるが！？
